attributes.action: allow Ugandan LGBT human rights campaigner into UK
attributes.additional_details:
We call on the government to reverse the decision banning entry into the UK to Kasha Jacqueline Nabagesera, a courageous woman who risks her life campaigning for LGBT rights in Uganda.  She has been denied a visa to the UK where she has been invited to speak at Foyle Pride Festival in Derry.

The government must reverse this decision and allow this brave women to speak.
